text: "If" is a 1971 song by American band Bread. It was taken from their third studio album Manna. It went to number 4 in the United States, number 6 in Canada and number 41 in Australia. It was covered by Telly Savalas where it topped the single charts in the United Kingdom in 1975. title: If (Bread song)
